main event: A bright circular object was observed hovering in the sky in Livonia, Michigan on February 6, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first sighted moving in a north-south direction and then hovered before moving east-west., The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes., The weather conditions during the observation were clear and calm., Witnesses described the object as round with a bright light in the center and reported no sound., There were two adults and two children who confirmed the sighting.
sighted object: a bright circular object in the sky
